camera.description: Camera is the pose and arena-user component data representing a user avatar.
camera.title: Camera

event.description: Events are ephemeral messages used to send user events like mouse movements or controller actions.
event.title: Event

handLeft.description: Hand Left is the left hand metadata pose and controller type of the user avatar.
handLeft.title: Hand Left

handRight.description: Hand Right is the right hand metadata pose and controller type of the user avatar.
handRight.title: Hand Right
